verses.roman:
mora sukha cāha yadi, nīlācale cala
āmāra śapatha, yadi āra kichu bala

synonyms: mora—of Me; sukha—the satisfaction; cāha—you want; yadi—if; nīlācale cala—go back to Jagannātha Purī (Nīlācala); āmāra śapatha—My condemnation; yadi—if; āra—more; kichu—something; bala—you say.
translation: "If you want My happiness, please return to Nīlācala. You will simply condemn Me if you say any more about this matter."
